entry.title: I have been accepted to the Buildspace S4

link.title: I have been accepted to the Buildspace S4

entry.summary:
What is Buildspace?
Buildspace is an online bootcamp that teaches you how to build a SaaS product. The bootcamp is 6 weeks long and you will learn how to build a SaaS product from scratch. I will learn how to build the frontend, backend, database, authentication, payment, etc. You will also learn how to deploy your app and how to market it.
